definitions.body: district in Egypt E. of lower Nile, v. Eb:GS 500 ff.; Naville:Goshen, 1887, who rds. hierogl. Kesem, but cf. Groff:JAs xiv. 527 (LXX Gesem ()Arabiav))—[[אֶרֶץ גּשֶׁן]] Ge 45:10 (JE) Ge 46:34, Ge 47:1, Ge 47:4, Ge 47:6, Ge 47:27, Ge 50:8, Ex 8:18, Ex 9:26 (all J); [[אַ֫רְחָה גּשֶׁן]] Ge 46:28 (J), [[גּ֑שְׁנׇה]] v:Ge 46:28, v:Ge 46:29 (both J), in both LXX kaq) (Hrw/wn po/lin cf. Di. (P has land [[רעמסס]] Ge 47:11 etc., cf. Di Ge 45:10.

[[ארץ]] [[הַגּשֶׁן]] Jos 11:16 (D), [[אֶרֶץ גּשֶׁן]] Jos 10:41 (D), [[גּשֶׁן]] Jos 15:51 (P) (LXX in all Gosom) a city named with [[חׂלֽן]] & [[גִּלֽה]] cf. Di.—not clearly located, but on southern border of Judah.
